resources.string: Running in Cyanogen Mod mode (using CM platfrom SDK 2).

1. Make sure yoiu have enabled the System UI Tuner, 
2. Click System UI Tuner and accept the prompt if any 
3. Go into Quick Settings 
4. Add a new tile named "%s" 
5. Head back here when you are done.
\n\nNo thurder actions needed, just add a tile.
